title: Rose and Mask
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Body cylindrical with slightly rounded bottom and flaring towards top; loop handle; painted with rose, leaves, and grotesque mask face in black, gilding and silvering; thin gilded and black band at top edge and black band at base
name: Cup
